title: Preventing work-care burnout through boundary support
description: Preventing work-care burnout through boundary support
content:
Scenario: Preventing work-care burnout through boundary support
    Given Maria faces constant impossible conflicts between work and sole parenting
    And work-care conflict is primary driver of single parent burnout
    When the workplace_elohim monitors Maria's situation
    Then it should detect when conflicts are becoming unsustainable
    And it should alert Maria before burnout occurs
    And it should help her maintain necessary boundaries with employer
    And it should suggest interventions including policy advocacy or job changes if needed
    And Maria should have AI support for preventing work-driven burnout
